dcterms:creator: S. e. Dahbi
J. Choma
B. Mellado
G. Mokgatitswane
X. Ruan
T. Celik
B. Lieberman
dcterms:description: Toy Monte Carlo (MC) events are used to estimate the corresponding trials factor through frequentist inference, serving as a basis for evaluating the performance of machine learning approaches in searches for new physics.
dcterms:title: Toy Monte Carlo (MC) events

dcterms:creator: G. Aad
S. Chatrchyan
and others
dcterms:description: Data from the ATLAS and CMS experiments at the LHC are utilized for searches for new resonances and to understand anomalies in multi-lepton final states.
dcterms:title: ATLAS and CMS experiments data

dcterms:creator: J. Alwall
M. Herquet
F. Maltoni
O. Mattelaer
T. Stelzer
dcterms:description: MadGraph5 is a software tool used for generating events in high-energy physics, allowing for the simulation of various processes relevant to the LHC.
dcterms:title: MadGraph5

dcterms:creator: T. Sjostrand
S. Mrenna
P. Z. Skands
dcterms:description: Pythia8 is a program for simulating high-energy collisions, providing detailed event generation for particle physics experiments.
dcterms:title: Pythia8

dcterms:creator: J. de Favereau
and others
dcterms:description: Delphes3 is a modular framework for fast simulation of a generic collider experiment, used to simulate detector responses in high-energy physics.
dcterms:title: Delphes3
